tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Shoulder SLAP (Tear) Lesions,Rotator Cuff Injury Treatment,
review: I just love the doctor! Simply the best Ortho! He explained the injury in detail *** **** ** *** **** ********* ******* **** * **** * **** *** ********* *** **** **

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had fracture in the hand at 8.30 a.m.  I reached his place even without informing. I got first aid immediately. I went to his clinic around 11 a.m. After taking x ray, ecg, and blood test, the steel implant surgery was completed around 5.30 p.m.
I had never seen such a fastest operation. Many many thanks to the doctor. The charges were very nominal and i got discharged at the earliest ***** **** ********* *** **** *** ****** ************Post operation consultations were very quick ie on phone even.
Within a week i am almost normal means, it is only because of Dr Senthil Kamalasekaran only. Hats off to him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Went with a great expectation of getting the best of attention to hear and diagnose the problem. started with a small treatment. advised MRI. in the evening.  Manged to get the films by 9 pm. he was kind enough to rush back to the clinic against traffic hazards to diagnose further. when the back pain was at its peak,  gave excellent telephonic support, physio advice and some medicine.  helped the patient to regain confidence and patient was responding very well.  his patience, timely responses and some times need for substitute medicines were wonderful.. we would love to go back to him. a reliable dependable trustworthy and friendly Dr. No fear at all to seek answers to our doubts.  Well done Dr. Senthil.
Rajagopalan  Harish, Luz Avenue Mylapore.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: My mother had a hairline fracture on her toe and the doctor and his expertise were quite good. No complaints on doctors skills but the clinic is only run with profit motive. They charge you Rs 100 for registration and give you a simple paper folder to show expenses. They charge Rs 400 per xray in this day and age when it's all digital! They charge you for everything small and the costs are exorbitant. I'll never visit this clinic or recommend such a money first administration again. A skilled doctor does not mean you can can charge unnecessarily.

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr Senthil is a ****** ******* *experienced,empathetic doctor who took the time to explain all the aspects of my surgery.Excellent post surgery clear do's and don'ts were prescribed ,along with systematic inclusion of physiotherapy in well structured reviews after the surgery.
 
By virtue of which 4 months after surgery for L5/S1 discectomy i am completly back to normal, and am able to get back to my fitness routine of running , swimming and supervised strength training.

Am completly satisfied and grateful for the excellent medical  care recieved under his supervision.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I was diagnosed with osteomyelitis in my right tibea one year ago. After consulting various doctors and even after undergoing a surgery the condition was not improved.
After consulting  Dr. Senthil kamalasekaran I got a hope.
He analysed the wound and the surgery was done successfully. The pus was removed and antibiotic beads was filled inside the bone. Now the wound has healed.
Dr.Senthil is very caring *** ******* ********* *** *********** **********  ***** ********** *********

tags: None
review: I recently consulted Dr. Senthil Kamalasekaran after my leg got twisted while getting down from an auto. I was unable to walk after that and even thought fracture will be there. He diagnosed me and told it might  due to breakage in ligament, that was a huge relief for me. X-ray was taken after that *** ****** *** ********* *** *******.  ** ** * ******* ****** *** very compassionate towards patients. My heartfelt thanks Doctor.

tags: None
review: very friendly and professional, he does not write unwanted test or medication. i did a shoulder arthroscopy surgery in August and the post & pre surgery care was amazing.. he is easily reachable on his mobile for any emergency queries . i would recommend his to my family and friends for sure..

tags: None
review: Moves friendly with the patients. Gives instructions in understandable way. Recovers the pain in a steady imorovement, giving proper advice in doing the exercise for heeling. Advicing to take tests only when it is needed. Providing the appointments only when the doctor is consulting otherwise informing the patient about the doctors inconvenience. Feels very confident when speaking to the doctor regarding the pain and its re leave.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had an issue with Right Shoulder pain due to bone spur last 2 years, it was a regular pain not being able to work on a laptop, sleepless nights, and difficulty driving a car. Went for Consultation As per Dr. Senthil Sir suggestion I underwent arthroscopic surgery in Apollo Hospital OMR - Discharged after 2 days. Post Surgery did Physiotherapy exercises, i started all normal activities within a week. now i completely alright.
Thanks to Dr. Senthil Kamalasekaran Sir.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Senthil is an empathetic and experienced doctor. We consulted him for the fracture of the greater trochanter of femur bone, of my 86 year old grandfather. His expertise and reassurance gave us the confidence to proceed with the surgery. The surgery was done at Apollo spectra hospital, MRC Nagar. The surgery went extremely well and the recovery was sooner than we expected. His constant guidance and care post surgery helped in nurturing my grandfather back to good health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: ****** ******* ** ********* *** *** *** he is treating my mother TS Geetha for the past one month ansd it is going very well. he took good care in arranging specialist doctors for my mother , we are still in treatment. I strongly believe he will save my mother and make her walk like before

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would love to mention about his care and friendliness towards patients. He listens to our health issues patiently and treats us with all better possibilities. He had understood the problem by just looking at my mother's knee, such a highly experienced.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: The doctor is very friendly. Every time he explained the procedure and treatment with great care. I had a very rare tumour. He treated it very well with delicate care. Post operation whenever I faced any problem I contacted him and he gave immediate response. This is really a great satisfaction for me. I recovered very fast. And now I am able to walk near to normality . I am really thankful to him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: We still remember we were completely lost after fracture of my ankle. We were so fortunate to land into Dr. Senthil's safe hands. He clearly explained to us the situation and gave us confidence. His skill and expertise were seen in the surgery and very fast recovery to standing on my own feet within 5 weeks. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Senthil Kamalasekaran is one among a genuine Doctor whom we have come accrossed , it's my pleasure to write on his way of conduct with patients, his friendliness , his way of approach in finding a remedy and his way of treatment.I personally recommend Dr.Senthil because he is the Doctor on call and never disappoints his patients and always treat them with courtesy.
Thanking you Doctor again

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr.Senthil Kamalasekaran is one of the most patient-friendly doctors I have ever visited.
He explains the health issue very clearly, the highlight being the clarity and the openness in his explanation about the health issue, the means of treatment the patient should undergo and also the methodology along with the quality of the materials used for the treatment.
The promptness and the friendliness in the doctor's approach towards the patient is highly appreciable.
I'm extremely happy with Dr.Senthil' s treatment and am completely cured of my' Broken tibia' issue in my left leg.
I gladly and positively recommend Dr. Senthil for any orthopedic issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Senthil Kamalasekaran is very professional and experienced doctor.  Dr Senthil far exceeded my expectations as a doctor, he took such wonderful care for me. 

I was beyond impressed and satisfied with the surgery and guidance provided during my “Left Hand Humerus Fracture”. 

He always given us plenty of time to listen our issues without feeling rushed and clarified our doubts with his experience and brilliance the way a patient understands.

I can’t describe how grateful I am for him.

But I VERY strongly recommending him for his services.

Nagoor Vali Shaik

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have met with accident and diagnosed with ACL/MCL repair 2 months before, ********* *** ********* ** *** *** ** *** **** ***** ****** * **** ******** i was initially afraid of operation as it was tear of ACL and MCL both ligament, finally i have spoken with doctor he initially explained me the complete surgery procedure, later i was operated end of Oct 2018 and been recovered after 60 days of the surgery (Able to walk completely without knee brace). A friendly doctor speaks like a friend to me, i am completely satisfied on the treatment. :)

I met him on last year for my husband's operation (ACL Reconstruction) and now he is totally cured. Doctor Senthil is very caring about the patient and he is also very helpful, supporting and once more thing that over telephone he gives the times for the patient after surgery when you back to home. I always recommend You because post operation care is very important.

Thank you Sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

I thank him for providing me his best possible services.

review: Over all experience is good.But make sure you keep another 1500rs aprox.extra on your hand for xray and physio.If you are paying through card this hospital put extra charge, for credit card 2% and debir card 1%, ***** *** **** ** *** **** ******** **** **** ***** **** *** *** ************ **** **** *** ** .Wondering how this systen works.Kudos to Digital india.

review: He was very friendly, concerned, polite and patient enough to hear and answer all my questions relating to my spine issue. He is always reachable for any clarification or complications. He gives positive hope keeping the patient mentally at ease. I'm still under treatment and would surely post my comment on my improvement of my health issue again. I would surely recommend him to others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I would like to share my excellent experience with Dr Senthil Kamalasekaran on the treatment to my wife on osteoporosis... Dr Senthil diagnosed and provided guided treatment which made my wife to sit back & relax, who was withering under pain for almost six months now. Especially for the past two months, she was undergoing severe pain and with Dr Senthil’s guidance she is better now.

Thanks a lot Dr Senthil and wish you a prosperous career to take care more patients. 

Chandran G Reddy
